title.narrative: Capacity Development of the Wastewater Management Authority in Thailand, Phase II

description.narrative: With COWI's repayment as a result of the flawed installations of the waste water system during the implementation of the project ¿The Waste Water Treatment Plant and Collection System in Phi Phi Island¿, this project aims to renovate and improve the wastewater treatment plant and collection system, which was constructed in the previous phase. The project comprises mainly the following three components. 1.Improvement of waste water collection system by enlarging the pipe diameter from 200 mm. to 400 mm. and the size of manhole to be 1 meter diameter. 2.Renovation of the pumping station by cleaning, repainting the building, re-wiring and install pump guide rail in the control room and improve the smell reduction system. 3.Renovation of constructed wetland by removing the soil layer from Ponds 2 and 3 and fill in the ponds with flake stones and rocks.
